pkgmetadata.longdescription: # paddypyUnder construction! Not ready for use yet! Currently experimenting and planning!Developed by Patrik (c) 2022## Examples of How To Use (Alpha Version) Print and get azure app-configuration keys and flags```pythonfrom paddypy import access# does a logging print out of the azure app-configuration keys and flags.access.listConfig()key = "username"# gets the lastest value for a given key# deactivate_kv_access choose if kv-ref should be accessed (access policies need to be correct) value = access.getValue(key=key, deactivate_kv_access=True) logging.info("Lastest value: " + value)# sets a key value# deactivate_kv_access choose if kv-ref should be accessed (access policies need to be correct) value = access.setValue(key=key, value="julia", content_type=None, tags: dict={}, label=None, deactivate_kv_access=False):logging.info("Lastest value: " + value)
